channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Behind the Curtain: Republicans see dire 2026 warning signs in these 5 polls
item.description: Everywhere Republicans look, they see big political trouble . Worse, they think things will get much bleaker before better as AI spreads through 2026....

item.title: Scoop: Exasperated House members want to make it harder to censure each other
item.description: House members in both parties are groaning about what they say is the out of control use of censure as a partisan tool — with one member even floating...

item.title: Electric car sales fuel record-breaking quarter for US clean-energy investments
item.description: Data: Rhodium Group; Chart: Axios Visuals Consumers scrambling to take advantage of expiring tax credits for electric cars drove a record-breaking qua...

item.title: Trump signs bill ordering DOJ to release Epstein files
item.description: President Trump signed a bill ordering the Department of Justice to release all of the files related to the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, he anno...

item.title: Trump's under-the-radar immigration dragnet
item.description: ICE gets all the attention, but a new cluster of joint task forces is quietly becoming a potent part of President Trump's mass deportations push . Why...

item.title: Trump to meet New York Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani on Friday
item.description: The 34-year-old democratic socialist has faced frequent public attacks from the president and has vowed to resist his agenda.

item.title: House votes to undo law allowing senators to sue over Jan. 6 subpoenas
item.description: The provision, which outraged House members, was tucked into a bill to reopen the government last week.

item.title: House Ethics opens investigation into Republican Rep. Cory Mills
item.description: The panel will probe multiple controversies Mills (R-Florida) has faced since joining the House, including allegations he benefited from federal weapo...

item.title: They retired from the government. Now they’re back, protecting forests Trump abandoned.
item.description: The U.S. Forest Service lost thousands of workers under Trump. Volunteers and retirees are trying to help — but things are breaking.

item.title: Trump-Marjorie Taylor Greene breakup shakes MAGA: ‘Mom and Dad are separated’
item.description: In Greene’s Georgia congressional district, much of the MAGA base has her back against Trump, who has called her a “traitor.”

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
